I ran into the same problem with Ant v 1.5.3-1:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter.
endTest(XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java:219)

when I use XML formatter in junit task. Plain text formatter works 
fine with the same test. I looked at Ant source:

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs/ant/src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskde
fs/optional/junit/XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java?
rev=1.23.2.1&only_with_tag=ANT_153&content-type=text/vnd.viewcvs-
markup

and it looks like a bug: NullPointerException might be thrown if 
setUp throws an exception. I have no time to verify it now, but you 
can check by creating dummy test with setUp. If you can confirm it, 
please report the bug to Ant project.
